question: I have had some medical concerns regarding my 14 yr old son.  He had an extreme case of fatigue back in june/08.  ER visit revealed very slightly elevated liver enzymes.  Follow up tests show the enzymes coming down, but still not normal yet.  last test results AST 28  ALT 34  Bilirubin 1.6.  Abdominal ultrasound everything normal except slight echogenicity but no discrete lesions are demonstrated.  However since his physical on May 1,  he has lost 16 pounds and unintentionally.  I don't know how much I should be concerned about this.  He does suffer from anxiety, but he does eat 3-4 times daily.  Should I be looking into other physical problems or is this ok?
title: 14 yr old boy with unexplained weight loss
